## directory.equivalent() function

Checks recursively that the contents of folderA are exactly equivalent to folderB

Checks that all the same files exist and the file contents are the same.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function equivalent(pathA: string, pathB: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pathA | <code>string</code> |  |
|  pathB | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if folders contain the exact same subfolders and files and the files contents are the same.
